posts.post_content:
Hi All.

I have a nice group of 3 T206 for sale:

Schlei (batting) ... Piedmont 460 f. 25 ... SGC 40 3 ... solid card with nice eye appeal

Fiene (throwing) ... Sweet Caporal 350 f. 30 ... SGC 40 3 ... pretty sharp and good looking

Wiltse (with cap) ... Piedmont 460 f. 25 ... SGC 40 3 ... slight wet sheet transfer of Piedmont back

I would like $150 for the trio, and I will cover shipping for you. Just shoot me a PM. Thank you everyone.

Derek

Hello.

I wanted to give this one a bump.

Thank you very much.

Derek

Hi.

Schlei is sold.

Hows about $105 for the Wiltse and Fiene, and I will cover shipping for you.

Thank You.

Derek

Hi. 

I wanted to bump this one once more.

They are a solid pair, but I do not really need these particular pieces for my collection.

I guess if anyone is interested just PM me an offer or even a trade proposal.

Perhaps cards like this are boring to the T206 collectors on net54 :o

Thanks again.

Derek
